relation: Every time I walk to my classes I see security riding around on their Carts. I have never seen one fight or heard any drama.
I am definitely satisfied with the campus and it being affordable is just an extra plus.
They are always having their organizations putting together fun activities and events to do around campus.
Cafeteria is actually really nice and they have a great variety of food, which is pretty good!

Phoenix College takes their academic rigor very seriously. Not only do they expect us to learn the material that is taught to us, but also the applied skills and critical thinking about the disciplines being taught. They hold us to high standards by assuring the difficulty of a course through insignificant amounts of content knowledge to be gained or complexity of the materials to be learned.
Check out ratemyprofessor.com and read reviews on the teachers before enrolling in classes to make sure you pick the one you feel will be the best for you.

I am beyond happy with the campus, teachers, and education I have received. The financial aid and advisement office provided so many helpful resources and all the information I needed to figure out the right path for me. Phoenix College has been a phenomenal experience.
pageTitle: Phoenix College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {226737=I would reccommend that prospective students ask as many questions of the enrollment counselor as possible. Once enrolled, use all of the help services, and especially the grammar checker in the library., 242541=Carrington College provides a great learning environment with instructors and staff who truely want their students to succeed. It provides smaller class sizes where you can get more 1:1 instruction. At the end of your program, they make a portfolio for you and assist with job placement., 100442=My children are my world. I have tow boys and one daughter that I will be soon giving birth to in July. Attending college is fun considering that I have a chance to make my children future brighter and easier for them to attend college,, 224470=I have to say that the bang for the buck is the support or team graduation behind me. I have a dedicated team of counselors and academic counselors to help me and give me tips on how to succeed as a student. The library has a program to download that takes the mystery out of APA papers, a generator to check grammar and spelling before turning in a paper, plus a math prep workshop, as well as other workshops. University of Phoenix has many tools to help the student succeed. No short cuts, but great support and support tools., 207569=For what you pay which is about 1100 dollars per semester, you definitely get your moneys worth., 362061=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 46618=Try Phoenix you can't go wrong. I have been in school now almost a year come Febuary 23, 2010.}

textAfterTable: Jessica from Fernley, NV 08/27/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 100 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is great for students who have other responsibilities and can not afford to be tied down to one location. Tips for prospective students If you do not think you have the time for school, forget that thought! You always have time for school, especially if it is online! Online schedules work for you. Bang for the buck Less expensive than other school, but same education. Am enjoying being here I am taking my classes online, and I love how flexible my schedules are. Am learning a lot The courses available really stretch your mind to new levels. Login to rate or flag the reviews
